00221 #if !defined ( PCNT_CTRL_HYST )
00222 
00223 #define PCNT_INIT_DEFAULT                                                           \
00224   { pcntModeDisable,                          /* Disabled by default. */            \
00225     _PCNT_CNT_RESETVALUE,                     /* Default counter HW reset value. */ \
00226     _PCNT_TOP_RESETVALUE,                     /* Default counter HW reset value. */ \
00227     false,                                    /* Use positive edge. */              \
00228     false,                                    /* Up-counting. */                    \
00229     false                                     /* Filter disabled. */                \
00230   }
00231 #else
00232 
00233 #define PCNT_INIT_DEFAULT                                                                        \
00234   { pcntModeDisable,                          /* Disabled by default. */                         \
00235     _PCNT_CNT_RESETVALUE,                     /* Default counter HW reset value. */              \
00236     _PCNT_TOP_RESETVALUE,                     /* Default counter HW reset value. */              \
00237     false,                                    /* Use positive edge. */                           \
00238     false,                                    /* Up-counting. */                                 \
00239     false,                                    /* Filter disabled. */                             \
00240     false,                                    /* Hysteresis disabled. */                         \
00241     true,                                     /* Counter direction is given by CNTDIR. */        \
00242     pcntCntEventUp,                           /* Regular counter counts up on upcount events. */ \
00243     pcntCntEventNone,                         /* Auxiliary counter doesn't respond to events. */ \
00244     pcntPRSCh0,                               /* PRS channel 0 selected as S0IN. */              \
00245     pcntPRSCh0                                /* PRS channel 0 selected as S1IN. */              \
00246   }
00247 #endif

00358 __STATIC_INLINE void PCNT_IntDisable(PCNT_TypeDef *pcnt, uint32_t flags)
00359 {
00360   pcnt->IEN &= ~(flags);
00361 }

00380 __STATIC_INLINE void PCNT_IntEnable(PCNT_TypeDef *pcnt, uint32_t flags)
00381 {

00406 /***************************************************************************/
00427 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t PCNT_IntGetEnabled(PCNT_TypeDef *pcnt)
00428 {
00429   uint32_t tmp = 0U;
00430 
00431 
00432   /* Store pcnt->IEN in temporary variable in order to define explicit order
00433    * of volatile accesses. */
00434   tmp = pcnt->IEN;
00435 
00436   /* Bitwise AND of pending and enabled interrupts */
00437   return pcnt->IF & tmp;
00438 }
00439
